content: the back loops of the remaining 6 stitches pull tight to close weave in the end 8 hair attach yellow to the top of the head ch9 8sc down the chain slip_stitch in the next stitch to the left ch9 8sc down the chain slt in the next stitch to the left ch9 8sc down the chain slip_stitch back into the same stitch and fo weave in ends collar leave a long tail in the beginning ch25 fo leave a tail for sewing sew down one end on the back of the neck then take the other end and sew it down on top of the first weave in ends 9 bow leave a long tail in the beginning chain 41 we will be making a loop starting in your first chain 40sc around r2-3 single_crochet around 2 rounds 40 r4 36sc leave 4 stitches unworked slip_stitch leave a long tail and fo using the tails you left behind wrap them around the bow leaving an open space in the middle attaching the bow stick your hook though the center of the bow then stick your hook through the top of each hair put the hair through the bow 10 buttons x3 magic_ring 6sc fo embroider the x onto the buttons smile take black yarn i prefer acrylic sew a line over 12 stitches between the 4th and 5th round up from the neck then take red yarn and sew 3 stitches over the black sew them around 6th round up from the neck in the center then sew 4 stitches on the right and left of the center ones around the 5th round up from the neck assembly 11 legs sitting sew on between rounds 4-9 of the body leaving about 5 stitches between them congratulations share your makes with me by tagging @crochetgrove
